summary:
IT Professional with over 18 years of practice in technology areas and multinational companies for different sectors in Colombian, Latin American, and Southeast Asian markets. Experience in retail, portfolio investing, consulting services, mining, consumer goods, and aeronautics industries. Extensive knowledge of directing, advising, and leading projects related to IT strategies, IT services, ERP implementation, process outsourcing, project management, IT infrastructure support, service desk, IT procurement, and IT operations.

Distinctive, efficient, analytical, problem-solving, and business knowledge oriented to lead high-impact projects. Focused on people management and adaptable in multicultural environments. Committed and easy to relate to executive levels. I am certified in PMP, Scrum Master, ITIL, and TOGAF.
